txt.en: 'If you find yourself near the Teeming Nests where the worms roam freely, you should hew down as many of the menaces as you see.\n\n'No good can come of those vile things being allowed to endure, and that is certain.'
'Well done, noble [placeholder]! I envy your ability to freely go and fight who or what you will. Here we can only watch as the forces of evil creep ever closer to our walls....'
'Anything you can do to reduce the number of those slimy worms in Eorlsmead will be a boon to us.'
Worms haunt the northern reaches of Eorlsmead near Thinglad's edge.
Defeat worms from the Teeming Nests ([placeholder]/[placeholder])
Worms can be found at Teeming Nests to the north of Eorlsmead.\n\nYou should go defeat many worms in Teeming Nests to lessen the threat of attacks by the evil creatures.
Sabert stands at the gate of Stangard.\n\nYou should return to Sabert with news of your victory over the worms of the Teeming Nests.
